LightningComponentBundle.description: Renders any type of text field (input, textarea, richtext).

property.name: readonly
property.label: Readonly
property.description: Only for Component input and textarea

property.name: type
property.label: Type
property.description: Only for Component input. Acceptable values: color, date, datetime, email, number, password, text, time, url

property.name: formatter
property.label: Formatter
property.description: Only for Component input of Type number. Acceptable values: currency, decimal, percent, percent-fixed

property.name: max
property.label: Max
property.description: Maximum number of characters or Maximum value acceptable.

property.name: min
property.label: Min
property.description: Minimum number of characters or Minimum value acceptable.

property.name: pattern
property.label: Pattern
property.description: Only for Component input of Types: email, password, text, url

property.name: step
property.label: Step
property.description: Only for Component text of Type number

property.name: disabledCategories
property.label: Disabled categories
property.description: A comma-separated list of button categories to remove from the toolbar. Only for Component richtext. Acceptable values: FORMAT_FONT, FORMAT_TEXT, FORMAT_BODY, ALIGN_TEXT, INSERT_CONTENT, REMOVE_FORMATTING

property.name: emptyErrorMessage
property.label: Empty error message
property.description: Error message to be displayed when a required field is empty

property.name: maxErrorMessage
property.label: Above max error message
property.description: Error message to be displayed when the value is above the maximum

property.name: minErrorMessage
property.label: Bellow min error message
property.description: Error message to be displayed when the value is bellow the minimum

property.name: mismatchErrorMessage
property.label: Patter mismatch error message
property.description: Error message to be displayed when the value does not match the pattern
